Village_Settlement: Xiacuo village is part of the Zhengban Administrative Village 郑阪行政村. The village has over 600 people.
Surname_Groups: The main surname group is the Wu 吴. They are related to the Wu of Dingcuo 顶厝.
Village_Temples: 1) Yongxing beishê 永兴北社 is co-owned by Dingcuo 顶厝 and Xiacu 下厝. The main gods worshipped are Zunzhu mingwang 尊主 明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. Secondary gods: Qianshi shengfei 钱氏圣妃, Dongyue zhusheng dadi 东岳注生大帝, and Wushi xianfei 吴氏仙妃.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/11, villagers from Xiacuo 下厝 together with villagers from Dingcuo 顶厝 take Tiangong yuanshuai 田公 元帅 and Lifu zhongjun 李府中军 on a procession around the two villages to xingdao 行道 practice the Dao in each household. At night there is a procession of lanterns.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/28: The birthday celebration of Dongyue zhusheng dadi 东岳注生大帝 is held with opera performances. 5/19: The birthday celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 is held with opera performances.
